item.title: Disposition of enemy forces in the front of the 17th Corps (French), September 25-30, 1918

caption.item: Situation des Forces Ennemies. Devant Le Front du 17e C.A. Entre le 25-30. Sep. 1918

item.note: In this map, inclusive, natural features, towns, roads, etc., are in mauve. Enemy front is marked by a solid red line. Enemy division boundaries are broken red lines. Designations of enemy divisions are in red letters. Movements of enemy troops ascertained before the date of the map are in red. Movements ascertained after the date of the map are in red. Movements ascertained after the date of the map are also in red in this particular map. The groupings of General Von Marwitz' army are indicated by green letterings - West Meuse Group, East Meuse Group, Ornes Group and Army Detachment C.

item.title: Disposition of enemy forces in the front of the 17th Corps (French), October 8, 1918

caption.item: Situation des Forces Ennemies. Devant Le Front du 17e C.A. Le 8 Octobre 1918

item.note: In this map, inclusive, natural features, towns, roads, etc., are in mauve. Enemy front is marked by a solid red line. Enemy division boundaries are broken red lines. Designations of enemy divisions are in red letters. Movements of enemy troops ascertained before the date of the map are in red. Movements ascertained after the date of the map are in red. Movements ascertained after the date of the map are in blue. The groupings of General Von Marwitz' army are indicated by green letterings - West Meuse Group, East Meuse Group, Ornes Group and Army Detachment C.

item.title: Disposition of enemy forces in the front of the 17th Corps (French), September 12, 1918

caption.item: Situation des Forces Ennemies. Devant Le Front du 17e C.A. Le 12 Septbre 1918

item.note: In this map, inclusive, natural features, towns, roads, etc., are in mauve. Enemy front is marked by a solid red line. Enemy division boundaries are broken red lines. Designations of enemy divisions are in red letters. Movements of enemy troops ascertained before the date of the map are in red. Movements ascertained after the date of the map are in red. Movements ascertained after the date of the map are in blue. The groupings of General Von Marwitz' army are indicated by green letterings - West Meuse Group, East Meuse Group, Ornes Group and Army Detachment C.
